reactor.io.net

Class PeerStream<IN,OUT,CONN extends ChannelStream<IN,OUT>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.rx.Stream<CONN>
      • reactor.io.net.PeerStream<IN,OUT,CONN>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.reactivestreams.Publisher<CONN>, NonBlocking
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatagramServer, HttpClient, HttpServer, TcpClient, TcpServer

    public abstract class PeerStream<IN,OUT,CONN extends ChannelStream<IN,OUT>>
extends Stream<CONN>
    Abstract base class that implements common functionality shared by clients and servers.
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin, Stephane Maldini
